content: >>whether it’s the complete lack of nightlife or the spatial experience of walking through a canyon of nearly identical residential towers, Riverside South is radically different from the vibrant westside neighborhoods it is surrounded by. Actually, Riverside South is completely surrounded by the superblock featuring Lincoln Towers and similar atrocities. This is one of the worst, most anti-urban, un-vibrant square block in New York City. Riverside South is a Jacobsian Platonic ideal by comparison.
